activities: Ayasdi, Inc. (“Ayasdi”) collects the following personal information from users on its website located at www.ayasdi.com, users of Ayasdi’s services and software: full name, title, company, address and telephone number, as well as any additional information a user may provide on a form on Ayasdi’s website. This information is collected when users contact Ayasdi with questions or comments, request and/or receive technical support and use the software. Ayasdi uses the personal information collected on its website in accordance with its website privacy policy. Ayasdi provides or provides access to Ayasdi customers' personally identifiable information to the vendors and service agencies that Ayasdi engages to assist Ayasdi in performing services on Ayasdi’s behalf.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
